Summary: stargazing when an orb whent from N to S and seemed to hit an inviable wall at that moment a huge ship was revealed ejecting same type of orb in opposite direction which seemed to hit another cloaked ( never saw what was shooting from N)
divs: Sighting DetailsI was star gazing, looking east when I decided to lean back and look overhead. I observed 2 or 3 orbs going from north to south ( short distance- 3 fist wide?), that is when what has to be a HUGE ship uncloaked and engaged sending the same type of plasma fire ball back which would just disappear behind some type of cloak. The ship would re-cloak and only be visible when firing. This went on between 3 to 5 minutes. This ship was huge and reminded me of something out of "starwars", needless to say I was very scared and it put a hamper on my star gazing for sometime. It was stationary and then it was over and just disappeared. I was so stunned and did not want to believe what I had seen, I observed for approximately another hour and nothing. I was so stunned and scared, that I finally woke my husband who believed me but wanted to calm me saying that just probably meteorites. I've seen hundreds if not thousands of meteorites, they don't come from ships.
trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around June 5th 2012
